title: Valencia Escape Located in Bonaire Aldaia Mall
description: Be immersed in Valencia's vibrant culture, exceptional dining scene and buzzing nightlife when you stay at Holiday Inn Express Valencia - Bonaire, an IHG Hotel. Spend days exploring the city's sites including the Ciudad de las Artes y las Ciencias, order a pan of paella (Valencia is the birthplace of this famous dish), and go shopping at Bonaire Aldaia mall. Return to your hotel by day's end and order a drink at the lobby bar or grab a snack from the vending machines.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Valencia - Bonaire, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Parque Comercial y de Ocio Bonaire, Valencia 46960, Spain

vendor_name: Hotel Hospes Palau de la Mar
title: Valencia Five-Star Boutique Stay within a 19th-Century Manor House
description: Trace your way to Valencia on the coast of Spain where a palatial, five-star stay at Hospes Palau de La Mar awaits. This glamorous boutique hotel housed in a 19th-century manor exudes sophistication and charm from all angles, and the striking lobby boasting pristine white pillars is sure to impress. Indulge in a treatment at the Bodyna Spa, savour a refreshing horchata and Mediterranean cuisine at Ampar Restaurant, or venture out to explore high-end boutiques outside your doorstep.
offer_address: Avenue de Navarro Reverter, 14, 46004 Valencia, Spain
